title: When all of your friends are getting boosted
body: ;-; They say they can get out of bronze by themselves, but they still get boosted by high golds/low plats.

replies.body: Lol, I had a friend who got boosted and denied it for so long but he finally admitted it when we showed him our evidence lol.

I don't understand boosting. It's like paying 2 strangers to have sex just so they could say that you were the one who got laid. 

Wouldn't you rather be the one getting laid?
It's more like paying someone to renovate your house because you don't have the skill to do it yourself.
